name: Blob Runner (GeoSalsa, Lizical, YxungMexican, IKODI008, MelFortin)
name_original: Blob Runner (GeoSalsa, Lizical, YxungMexican, IKODI008, MelFortin)
description: Blob Runner is a rhythm based platformer which follows our main protagonist the Slime in his journey to escape the lab to achieve true freedom and start his quest to explore the world. However the scientist has laid traps and pits all over the lab to prevent our friend from escaping. You must follow the music and help Slime jump across various traps and pitfalls to finally let him escape the clutches of the scientist.
